Summary: experienced a ufo sighting in the summer of 1972,
divs: sighting details i was 15 yrs old, i saw something out the backwindow of my house. i looked in the sky and saw a round, silver objectw\lights. i remember that it wasnt dark when i saw this, but the next thing iremember was it being black, night sky. when i arrived in the front, this objectmoved rapidly up into the sky, then took a sharp turn...as i watched, words cameto me that these intities communicate telepathically. as it raced through thenight sky, it was as small as a star, that is when it took a sharp turn anddisappeared. this has been so long ago (1972) that sometimes i think i dreamedit. but, my sister remembers me going into the house and telling her what isaw. i have often wondered if anyone else saw this over the night sky, thesummer of 1972, in virginia beach.
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Virginia Beach
There were no other sightings in Virginia Beach on or around June 30th 1972
